subject: AI & Agents
title: Creativity in the Age of Abundance
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Creativity in the Age of Abundance.

hook.text: When anyone can generate a million images in a day, what makes one image worth looking at?

buildup.text: AI makes creative production nearly free. The bottleneck shifts from creation to curation.

discovery.text: Attention becomes the scarce resource. Standing out in infinite content requires human taste.

twist.text: Paradoxically, more AI content may make authentic human stories more precious.

climax.text: The creators who thrive will be curators, editors, and storytellers â€” not just generators.

punchline.text: In a world of infinite content, meaning is the scarcest resource.

quiz.question: What becomes the bottleneck when AI makes creation nearly free?
